subject: Football
Recordings and Downloads (Video)
lead_paragraph: In discussions of changes to the N.F.L.’s confidential rulebook, known as the game operations manual, one team, the New England Patriots, has surfaced more than any other.
snippet: In discussions of changes to the N.F.L.’s confidential rulebook, known as the game operations manual, one team, the New England Patriots, has surfaced more than any other.
